cgcloud__Promotion_Push_Status__c.name: cgcloud__Promotion_Push_Status__c
cgcloud__Promotion_Push_Status__c.description: Contains for each push process an entry that contains the status and statistics for the push.

cgcloud__Calculation_End_Time__c.description: Time at which the parent promotion calculation chain ended for this promotion.

cgcloud__Children_Calculation_End_Time__.description: Time at which the Children Calculation Job ended for this parent promotion.

cgcloud__Distribution_End_Time__c.description: Time at which the distribution job ended for this parent promotion.

cgcloud__Entry_Time__c.description: Time at which the push started.

cgcloud__Error_Ocurred__c.description: Flag that indicates whether an error occurred within the chain.

cgcloud__Metric_Preparation_End_Time__c.description: Time at which the prepare metric job ended for this parent promotion.

cgcloud__Nr_Of_Child_Promotions__c.description: Number of child promotions that are considered in this push process.

cgcloud__Parent_Calculation_End_Time__c.description: Time at which the Parent Calculation Job ended for this parent promotion.

cgcloud__Status__c.description: Status of the promotion push process.

cgcloud__Sync_End_Time__c.description: Time at which the Synchronisation from parent to child promotions ended.

cgcloud__Transaction_Id__c.description: Transaction ID under which the push was run.

cgcloud__Upload_Kpis_End_Time__c.description: Time at which the Upload KPI Job is ended for this parent promotion.
